attributes.additional_details: The Goverment to bring boot camps in for all these thugs. Six month of harsh punishment should teach them to respect & behave  & while in the boot camp suspend all child family benefits while they are away. Their are a number of closed military bases in the UK that would be easily adapted. We have seen already in the Courts they have no fear of the law & are proud of what they have done. We have been too soft for years due to liberals who say we cannot use disipline to keep thase thugs inplace., now we are all going to pay the price!!
